Smash.help: Smash is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.
Smash.targetHelp: Smash is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a greater damage and a high chance of Knockback.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Fissure.help: Slag Golems can execute a powerful stomp can cause a seismic disturbance. This will crack the Earth itself and send a Fissure towards a targeted foe, throwing him and nearby enemies into the air and possibly Disorienting them. Fissure deals no damage on its own.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Foot_Stomp.help: Slag Golems can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.
Foot_Stomp.targetHelp: Slag Golems can use their superior leg strength to stomp the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range.
